alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Richland; Vernon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 1:48AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Vernon, western Richland and northern Crawford Counties through 230 AM CDT... At 147 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Coon Valley to near Lansing. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Viroqua and Westby around 155 AM CDT. La Farge around 210 AM CDT. Boscobel around 225 AM CDT. Hillsboro around 230 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Jersey Valley County Park, Horrigan Ridge, Bloom City, Fairview, Highway 171 And County U, County Roads A And Z, Petersburg, Highway 82 And County A, Fargo and County Roads D And P. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
